casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. NEWSOME
v.
HACK 2019-0457 Supreme Court of Ohio. June 5, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENT

O'Connor, C.J., and Kennedy, French, Fischer, DeWine, Donnelly, and Stewart, JJ., concur.

MERIT DECISION WITHOUT OPINION

In Mandamus. Sua sponte, alternative writ granted. The following briefing schedule is set for presentation of evidence and filing of briefs pursuant to S.Ct.Prac.R. 12.05: The parties shall file any evidence they intend to present within 20 days, relator shall file a brief within 10 days after the filing of the evidence, respondents shall file a brief within 20 days after the filing of relator's brief, and relator may file a reply brief within 7 days after the filing of respondents' brief.
